name: Chief Coordinator
specialRules: Chief Coordinator has Commanding Presence(1), Scoring
description: All senior Federation military staff has to do field-time. This is often looked down upon as a lot of field-work involve covering up PMC atrocities, coddling local warlords and shepherding witless war-correspondents.
startingCost: Chief Coordinator Squad Leader and 4 Assistants for 50pts
availability: Must include one and one only Chief Coordinator unit

options.choice: Chief Coordinator may replace SMG with
alternatives: Pistol and Melee Specialist for free

options.choice: Chief Coordinator may take one Call-in

name: PMC Infantry
description: Having long abolished conscription and persistent recruitment difficulties has led the Federation to rely heavily on Private Military Companies for its manpower needs. These contractors come from all over and most have less than spotless pasts, PMCs have in fact been known to recruit right out of Imperial prisons. But this suits the Federation just fine and PMC casualties are never officially listed anyways.

options.choice: Squad Leader may replace Rifle with
alternatives: Pistol and Melee Specialist for free

options.choice: One Contractor may replace Rifle with
Or may replace 2 Contractors for a weapon team with Base Size 40mm, Team(2), Unwieldy and

name: Marines Infantry
description: Professional, motivated and armed to the teeth, the Marines are at the tip of any Federation operation.

options.choice: Squad Leader may replace Assault Rifle with
alternatives: Pistol and Melee Specialist for free

options.choice: One Marine may replace Assault Rifle with

name: Operators Infantry
description: The reach of the Federation Special Operations Command, FSOC, is long and it is commonly jested that FSOC has eyes on every world. This is something a FSOC operative would be quick to neither confirm nor deny, if you could find one that is.

options.choice: Squad Leader may replace Assault Rifle with
alternatives: Pistol and Melee Specialist for free

options.choice: One Operator may replace Assault Rifle with
Or may replace 2 Operators for a weapon team with Base Size 40mm, Team(2), Unwieldy and

name: Super Soldiers
description: The worst kept secret of the Federation is its Super Soldier program. Never officially acknowledged the public came to refer to them as Supers and their reputation is that of legend. Clad in fully enclosed exo-skeletons

options.choice: Squad Leader may replace Assault Rifle with
alternatives: Shotgun and Melee Specialist for free

options.choice: One Super may replace Assault Rifle with
